DOC.brief_summary: Study Phase: phase 1 and phase 2 Objective: Evaluation of the effect of lenalidomide, cyclophophamide and prednisone (REP) in patients with relapsed multiple myeloma previously treated with lenalidomide Study design: prospective, multicenter, non-randomized
DOC.brief_title: Revlimid, Endoxan, Prednison Evaluation After Prior Revlimid Treatment (REPEAT)
DOC.detailed_description: The REPEAT-study is a prospective, multicenter, non-randomized phase 1 and phase 2 study in which we evaluate the effect of lenalidomide, cyclophosphamide and prednisone (REP-therapy) in patients with relapsed multiple myeloma, previously treated with lenalidomide and refractory to lenalidomide monotherapy.
DOC.criteria: salmon & Durie stage II/III A or B previous lenalidomide refractory disease patient commits to pregnancy prevention programme nonsecretory myeloma known hypersensitivity to lenalidomide inadequate marrow reserve
